import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const FormContainer = props => { let setTime = props.setTime let getTime = props.getTime const onChangeTime = (event) => { setTime({...getTime, [event.currentTarget.id]: event.currentTarget.value}) console.log(event.currentTarget.value) } return(

Please Enter a time and a Timezone!









); } export default FormContainer
